DOC.brief_title: Ultrasonic Versus Monopolar Energy-based Surgical Device Colpotomy
DOC.detailed_description: According previous study perform porcine bovine tissue , ultrasonic energy base surgical device ( ESDs ) create less surgical smoke , involve less visual obstruction , produce less lateral thermal damage monopolar ESDs . However , study compare ultrasonic ESD monopolar ESD laparoscopic colpotomy term surgical smoke lateral thermal damage . Therefore , aim randomize trial compare degree surgical smoke obstruct vision thermal damage cause two different ESDs ( ultrasonic versus monopolar ESD ) colpotomy total laparoscopic hysterectomy .
